briefing.summary: Big progress on Booked.Travel yesterday - finance dashboard now pulls real data from Whop API. While you were sleeping, I built this Command Center dashboard and thought about some ideas for Spark Studio.

thoughts.idea: A/B testing framework for checkout pages
thoughts.details: Could automatically test different copy, pricing displays, or CTA buttons and track conversion. Run tests, measure, iterate.

thoughts.idea: Automated payment reminders via Whop webhooks
thoughts.details: When Whop fires 'payment.failed', send a friendly reminder email. Could reduce churn on failed payments.
I could push updates in real-time during our sessions so you see progress as it happens.
Automated summary of all projects' progress, MRR changes, tasks completed. Sent every Monday morning.

notes.title: Whop API Tips
notes.content: Array params need URL encoding: statuses%5B%5D=active. Always include company_id. split_pay_required_payments = total installments.

notes.title: Insider Expeditions Contacts
notes.content: Matt is the main contact. Slack channel for communications. They paid $8k for Booked.Travel setup.
